channel.title: CVE Feed for Fred -- MODX Revolution
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fred -- MODX Revolution

item.title: CVE-2019-1010178|2024-08-05T03:07:18.450Z -- fred -- modx%20revolution
item.description: Fred MODX Revolution < 1.0.0-beta5 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control - CWE-648. The impact is: Remote Code Execution. The component is: assets/components/fred/web/elfinder/connector.php. The attack vector is: Uploading a PHP file or change data in the database. The fixed version is: https://github.com/modxcms/fred/commit/139cefac83b2ead90da23187d92739dec79d3ccd and https://github.com/modxcms/fred/commit/01f0a3d1ae7f3970639c2a0db1887beba0065246.
